item.title: The viewport metatag (Mobile web part 1)
item.description: ⚠️ Warning: this is an old article and may include information that’s out of date. ⚠️ The skinny Use this: 1 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" /> Introduction This series of posts is intended to introduce web developers to basic techniques for designing for the mobile web. It assumes at least a basic knowledge of creating desktop websites. The problem Ok, so you’ve settled down to learn how to write a website for a mobile device using your current knowledge of building desktop websites.
